RTCPeerConnectionRTCPeerConnection.summary:
The RTCPeerConnection()
constructor returns a newly-created , which represents
a connection between the local device and a remote peer.

remarks.para:
-Signaling and video calling
-WebRTC architecture overview
-Lifetime of a WebRTC session

RTCPeerConnectionRTCPeerConnection.returns:
A newly-created object, configured as described by
configuration, if specified; otherwise, configured to appropriate basic
defaults.
